title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 June 04 WE [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Wednesday, 04 June 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Wednesday, June 4 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex and David Knight cover the 25th anniversary of the Tiananmen Square Massacre in which heavily armed Chinese troops and tanks killed unarmed protestors who were blocking the military's advance towards Tiananmen Square in the center of Beijing, which thousands of student demonstrators had occupied for seven weeks. CNN called their coverage of the massacre a "watershed" moment in the network's history, but when it comes to acts of resistance here in the U.S., such as the Bundy Ranch standoff, CNN and other mainstream networks throw protestors under the bus. The mainstream media, however, is rapidly losing influence, and one former CBS correspondent even confirmed that the major networks are manipulated and controlled by the establishment. Moreover, the major networks provided near zero coverage of the recent Bilderberg meeting, and investigative reporter and author Daniel Estulin joins the show to break down why.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually

 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement

 Think for yourself!
